author: jerenkrantz
msg: mod_authz_svn: ap_satisfies as an optional function was reverted in httpd's
trunk a while back (r534533).  This code never made into an official httpd
release, so revert so that we can build with current httpd trunk again.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Add -p to match GNU diff's show C function support.
(svn_diff__file_output_baton_t): Add boolean flag and fields to store context.
(output_unified_line): Collect extra context if it matches our "regexp".
(output_unified_flush_hunk): Emit extra context if we have it.
(svn_diff_file_output_unified3): Add in new parameter to new 1.5 function.

author: brane
msg: STATUS: Remove r28658, etc. from backport candidate list. A backport would
introduce new public functions, in violation of our versioning rules.

author: brane
msg: This backport would break our compatibility guidelines.
